casebody.data:
Kweku HANSON
v.
COMMISSIONER OF CORRECTION Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided January 18, 2017

Kweku Hanson, self-represented, in support of the petition.

*654Timothy F. Costello, assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The petitioner Kweku Hanson's petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 169 Conn.App. 317, 150 A.3d 234 (2016), is denied.
